text: Herman Coessens (22 August 1943 â€“ 9 January 2023) was a Belgian actor. Coessens was most known as a stage actor at where he played between the 1970s and 1990s. Coessens also played in many television series, including , , Ons geluk, , and Flikken. Coessens married to actress Lieve Moorthamer. He died from an illness in January 2023, at the age of 79. ==References== Category:Belgian stage actors Category:Belgian television actors Category:1943 births Category:2023 deaths Category:People from East Flanders Category:Place of death missing
